title: Truth or Dare
description: People cannot lie. In a world where humans fully trust each other, the existence of people who can lie is merely a myth, a figment of fiction. Saegye is a dare, a person who can tell both truths and lies; he cheats and deceives for his own gain. However, Lee Jinsol steps on his tail, and proposes an offer Saegye can’t refuse. Three days later he started telling Saegye he loves him.
